name: Breaking from Hell
description:
Entry for The GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022. This was my first game jam and I'm quite happy with what I achieved.

The theme being "death is only the beginning" gave me a lot of ideas, but being a newbie, I've tried to do something achievable at my level. I wish I could have done a lot more but submitting something is already a good first step.

Thus here I am, with a very short game revolving around a soul trying to escape Hell.

Credits: Assets made by me, Acrem.

Controls: WASD or directionnal arrows.

Known issues: Some collider problem with the last enemy type, it's possible to get hit even when dodging. I'll fix it whenever I can.
